name: Slot Car VR
summary:
Slot Car VR (Early Access) 

Bringing back the nostalgia and joy of slot car racing in your home, but this time it's better!

Let your imagination run wild with no limitations on track or props. The intuitive track building tool allows you to create custom circuits quickly and satisfyingly. 

Play without controllers - Build track, place props and race, all without picking up a controller (well a physical one at at least!)

Multiplayer - Locally and globally. Play against others in your home or race and...
